French.title: Coq au Vin
French.instructions: Marinate chicken in wine for 2 hours. Cook bacon until crispy. Brown chicken pieces. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, and seasonings. Simmer for 1 hour. Make roux with butter and flour. Add to sauce and simmer until thickened. Serve hot.

French.title: Bouillabaisse
French.instructions: Heat oil and cook onions, garlic, and fennel. Add tomatoes, orange peel, and seasonings. Add stock and wine. Simmer for 30 minutes. Add fish and shellfish. Cook until done. Garnish with parsley and serve with rouille.

French.title: Ratatouille Niçoise
French.instructions: Sauté each vegetable separately in olive oil. Combine all vegetables in large pot. Add garlic, herbs, and seasonings. Simmer for 45 minutes until vegetables are tender. Serve hot or cold.

French.title: Beef Bourguignon
ingredients: 3 lbs beef chuck, cut into cubes
French.instructions: Marinate beef in wine for 2 hours. Cook bacon until crispy. Brown beef pieces. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, and seasonings. Simmer for 2 hours. Make roux with butter and flour. Add to sauce and simmer until thickened. Serve hot.

French.title: Quiche Lorraine
French.instructions: Prebake pie crust. Cook bacon until crispy. Sauté onion until soft. Beat eggs with cream, milk, and seasonings. Add bacon, onion, and cheese. Pour into crust. Bake at 375°F for 35-40 minutes until set. Let cool before slicing.

Italian.title: Osso Buco alla Milanese
Italian.instructions: Season veal shanks with salt and pepper. Brown in oil and butter. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add wine, stock, tomatoes, and seasonings. Simmer for 2 hours until tender. Serve with risotto and gremolata.

Italian.title: Risotto ai Porcini
Italian.instructions: Soak mushrooms in hot water. Sauté onion and garlic in oil. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes. Add wine and cook until absorbed. Add stock gradually, stirring constantly. Add mushrooms and cook until rice is creamy. Stir in cheese and butter. Garnish with parsley.

Italian.title: Saltimbocca alla Romana
Italian.instructions: Pound veal cutlets thin. Top each with prosciutto and sage leaf. Secure with toothpicks. Dredge in flour. Cook in oil for 2 minutes per side. Add wine and stock. Simmer for 5 minutes. Remove toothpicks and serve hot.

Italian.title: Penne all'Arrabbiata
Italian.instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Heat oil and cook garlic and chilies. Add wine and cook until reduced. Add tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes. Toss with pasta. Garnish with parsley and serve with Parmesan.

Italian.title: Tiramisu
Italian.instructions: Beat egg yolks with sugar until thick. Add mascarpone and mix well. Whip cream and fold into mixture. Mix coffee with liqueur. Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture. Layer in dish with cream mixture. Chill for 4 hours. Dust with cocoa powder before serving.

Spanish.title: Paella Valenciana
ingredients: 1 lb chicken thighs, cut into pieces
Spanish.instructions: Heat oil in large paella pan. Brown chicken and rabbit. Add vegetables and cook until soft. Add rice and cook for 2 minutes. Add stock, saffron, and seasonings. Simmer for 20 minutes without stirring. Let rest for 5 minutes. Serve with lemon wedges.

Spanish.title: Gazpacho Andaluz
Spanish.instructions: Chop all vegetables. Blend with oil, vinegar, and seasonings. Add water gradually until smooth. Chill for 2 hours. Serve cold with basil garnish.

Spanish.title: Tortilla Española
Spanish.instructions: Cook potatoes and onion in oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt. Add potato mixture to eggs. Cook in large skillet until set. Flip and cook other side. Serve warm or cold.

Spanish.title: Pulpo a la Gallega
Spanish.instructions: Boil octopus for 45 minutes until tender. Boil potatoes until done. Slice octopus and potatoes. Drizzle with oil and sprinkle with paprika and salt. Garnish with parsley and serve.

Spanish.title: Churros con Chocolate
Spanish.instructions: Boil water, butter, and salt. Add flour and stir until smooth. Beat in eggs one at a time. Pipe into hot oil and fry until golden. Roll in cinnamon sugar. For chocolate, heat cream and add chocolate and sugar. Stir until smooth. Serve churros with chocolate sauce.

Spanish.title: Quick French Onion Soup
Spanish.instructions: Melt butter and cook onions until caramelized. Add broth, wine, and thyme. Simmer for 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Top with bread and cheese. Broil until cheese melts. Serve hot.

Spanish.title: Quick Croque Monsieur
Spanish.instructions: Make béchamel sauce with butter, flour, milk, nutmeg, salt, and pepper. Layer ham and cheese between bread slices. Top with béchamel sauce. Broil until golden. Serve hot.

Spanish.title: Quick Italian Bruschetta
Spanish.instructions: Toast bread slices. Mix tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper. Top bread with tomato mixture. Serve immediately.

Spanish.title: Quick Carbonara
Spanish.instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Cook bacon until crispy. Beat eggs with Parmesan and black pepper. Toss hot pasta with bacon and garlic. Remove from heat and add egg mixture. Toss quickly until creamy. Serve immediately.

Spanish.title: Quick Spanish Tortilla
Spanish.instructions: Cook potatoes and onion in olive oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Add potato mixture to eggs. Cook in pan until set. Flip and cook other side. Serve warm or cold.

Spanish.title: Quick German Schnitzel
Spanish.instructions: Season cutlets with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs. Heat butter and oil. Cook cutlets for 3-4 minutes per side until golden. Serve with lemon wedges.

Spanish.title: Quick British Fish and Chips
Spanish.instructions: Cut potatoes into fries and fry until golden. Mix flour, baking powder, and beer for batter. Season fish with salt and pepper. Dip fish in batter and fry until golden. Serve with fries and malt vinegar.

Spanish.title: Quick Irish Stew
Spanish.instructions: Brown lamb in pot. Add vegetables and cook for 5 minutes. Add broth and thyme. Simmer for 15 minutes until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley.

Spanish.title: Quick Swiss Fondue
Spanish.instructions: Rub fondue pot with garlic. Heat wine until simmering. Mix cheeses with cornstarch. Add cheese gradually, stirring until melted. Add nutmeg. Serve with bread cubes for dipping.

Spanish.title: Quick Austrian Wiener Schnitzel
Spanish.instructions: Pound cutlets thin. Season with salt and pepper. Dredge in flour, then egg, then breadcrumbs. Heat butter and cook cutlets for 2-3 minutes per side until golden. Serve with lemon wedges.

Spanish.title: Quick French Crepes
Spanish.instructions: Mix all ingredients until smooth. Heat pan and pour batter. Cook for 2 minutes per side until golden. Fill with jam or Nutella. Roll and serve hot.

Spanish.title: Quick Italian Margherita Pizza
Spanish.instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Roll out dough. Spread tomato sauce. Top with mozzarella. Bake for 12 minutes until golden. Top with basil and drizzle with olive oil. Serve hot.

Spanish.title: Quick Spanish Gazpacho
Spanish.instructions: Chop all vegetables. Blend with oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper until smooth. Chill for 30 minutes. Serve cold with croutons.

Spanish.title: Quick German Bratwurst
Spanish.instructions: Heat oil in pan. Cook sausages for 8 minutes, turning occasionally. Add onion and bell pepper. Cook for 5 minutes until soft. Serve with mustard and sauerkraut.

Spanish.title: Quick British Shepherd's Pie
Spanish.instructions: Cook lamb with onion and carrot for 8 minutes. Add peas, broth, and Worcestershire sauce. Simmer for 5 minutes. Top with mashed potatoes. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes until golden.

Spanish.title: Quick Irish Soda Bread
Spanish.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add buttermilk and butter. Knead briefly. Shape into round loaf. Bake at 425°F for 30 minutes until golden. Cool on wire rack.

Spanish.title: Quick Swiss Rösti
Spanish.instructions: Squeeze excess water from potatoes. Heat butter in pan. Add potatoes and onion. Press down and cook for 8 minutes. Flip and cook for 8 more minutes until golden. Season with salt and pepper.

Spanish.title: Quick French Ratatouille
Spanish.instructions: Heat oil in pan. Cook onion and garlic for 3 minutes. Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook for 8 minutes. Add tomatoes and herbs. Simmer for 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

Spanish.title: Quick Italian Fettuccine Alfredo
Spanish.instructions: Cook pasta according to package. Melt butter with garlic. Add cream and simmer for 3 minutes. Add cheese and stir until melted. Toss with pasta. Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with parsley.

Spanish.title: Quick Spanish Patatas Bravas
Spanish.instructions: Heat oil in pan. Add potatoes and cook for 12 minutes until golden and crispy. Season with paprika, cayenne, and salt. Serve with aioli sauce.

Spanish.title: Quick German Sauerkraut
Spanish.instructions: Melt butter in pan. Cook onion for 3 minutes. Add sauerkraut and caraway seeds. Cook for 5 minutes. Add wine and simmer for 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

Spanish.title: Quick British Bangers and Mash
Spanish.instructions: Cook sausages in pan for 10 minutes. Boil potatoes until tender. Mash with butter and milk. Cook onion until caramelized. Serve sausages over mashed potatoes with gravy and onions.

Spanish.title: Quick Irish Colcannon
Spanish.instructions: Boil potatoes until tender. Cook cabbage for 5 minutes. Mash potatoes with butter and milk. Mix in cabbage and green onions. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot.

Spanish.title: Quick Swiss Cheese Fondue
Spanish.instructions: Rub pot with garlic. Heat wine until simmering. Mix cheeses with cornstarch. Add cheese gradually, stirring until melted. Serve with bread cubes for dipping.

Spanish.title: Quick Austrian Apfelstrudel
Spanish.instructions: Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and raisins. Layer phyllo sheets with butter. Add apple mixture. Roll and seal. Brush with butter. Bake at 375°F for 25 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar.
